name: Bill Rambeard's Rad Bad Blasterball
summary:
In this block breaker game inspired by 1976's Breakout, you play as Bill Rambeard at the heights of his powers competing in the fast-paced, razzle-dazzle world of Blasterball.

Bill is joined by a cast of characters who will help you along by playing polka as you break through the procedural-generated puzzles. Your only goal is to get the highest score you can!
